ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides simplified access to the device's current coordinate location using built-in GPS hardware.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int CHECK_PARAMETER
      The time interval required between location checks.
      private static java.util.Date lastCheck
      The time at which the location was last checked.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static double[] findLocation()
      Uses GPSTracker to acquire the lat/lon coordinates of the device.
      static void forceCheckGPS()
      Resets lastCheck, allowing a location check regardless of the time elapsed since the last check.
      static double[] getLocationCoordinates()
      If the required amount of time has passed since the last location check, and GPS location preference is selected, this method will attempt to acquire and return the lon/lat coordinates of the device.
      static java.lang.String getLocationName() 
      static boolean isLocationEnabled() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Location

        public Location()

    • Method Detail

      • getLocationName

        public static java.lang.String getLocationName()
        Returns:
        The name of the device's current location.

      • isLocationEnabled

        public static boolean isLocationEnabled()
        Returns:
        True if location services are enabled.

      • forceCheckGPS

        public static void forceCheckGPS()
        Resets lastCheck, allowing a location check regardless of the time elapsed since the last check.

      • getLocationCoordinates

        public static double[] getLocationCoordinates()
        If the required amount of time has passed since the last location check, and GPS location preference is selected, this method will attempt to acquire and return the lon/lat coordinates of the device.
        Returns:
        The device's lon/lat coordinates as an array of doubles.

      • findLocation

        private static double[] findLocation()
                              throws LocationNotReachableException
        Uses GPSTracker to acquire the lat/lon coordinates of the device.
        Returns:
        The device's lon/lat coordinates as an array of doubles.
        Throws:
        LocationNotReachableException - If the GPSTracker cannot get the devices location.
